SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.workload.brokers

Interface IEntryPoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseEntryPoint, EntryPoint, Route53EntryPoint
public interface IEntryPoint
Represents an entry point for an application, which uses multiple clouds (Multi-Cloud). Each entry point is associated with a list of web brokers, representing the different cloud data centres. The entry point receives workloads (web sessions) and forwards them accordingly to the registered web brokers.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Method Details

    • registerBroker

      void registerBroker(WebBroker broker)
      Registers a broker/cloud to this entry point. Subsequently the entry point will consider it when distributing the workload among the registered clouds.
      Parameters:
      broker - - the broker to register. Must not be null.

    • deregisterBroker

      void deregisterBroker(WebBroker webBroker)
      Deregisters the broker/cloud from this entry point. Subsequent workload coming to this entry point will not be distributed to this cloud.
      Parameters:
      webBroker - - the broker to deregister/remove. Must not be null.

    • getAppId

      long getAppId()
      Returns the id of the application, which this entry point is a part of.
      Returns:
      - the Id of the application, which this entry point is a part of.

    • dispatchSessions

      void dispatchSessions(List<WebSession> webSessions)
      Dispatches the sessions to the appropriate brokers/clouds.
      Parameters:
      webSessions - - the web sessions to dispatch. Must not be null.

    • getSessionsDispatched

      long getSessionsDispatched()
      Returns how many sessions have been dispatched by this entry point.
      Returns:
      how many sessions have been dispatched by this entry point.
